raw_text: Cover Art  The Towers of KEILAH    Ferdinand Ladera is a well acclaimed artist born in Iligan, the city of waterfalls, situated in the southeastern part of the Philippines. He has captured the attention of art enthusiasts with his signature style of "dream brought to life" digital painting.  Ferdinand was trained and received a bachelor's degree in Fine Arts at FEATI University in Manila, Philippines. He has a diverse background as a fine artist, graphic designer, and photographer. He is presently employed as a concept / 3D artist at LadyLuck Digital Media, a game outsourcing company.

Cover Art
The Towers of KEILAH
Ferdinand Ladera is a well acclaimed artist born in Iligan, the city of waterfalls, situated in the southeastern part of the Philippines. He has captured the attention of art enthusiasts with his signature style of "dream brought to life" digital painting.
Ferdinand was trained and received a bachelor's degree in Fine Arts at FEATI University in Manila, Philippines. He has a diverse background as a fine artist, graphic designer, and photographer. He is presently employed as a concept / 3D artist at LadyLuck Digital Media, a game outsourcing company.
